title: 3 Lives Collide 'At The Cat's Pajamas'
teaser: 2 a.m. at the Cat's Pajamas is a novel about three rolling stones who run into each other on the eve of Christmas Eve. NPR's Scott Simon speaks with the author, Marie-Helene Bertino.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
